name: hi. postcards. ok.
description:
hi. this is a set of 4 postcards. they are offset printed on 130lb. un-coated cover stock. each card has a different message on the front but shares the same message on the back. the messages are:

1. hi. i am in love with you. ok.
2. hi. how are you doing. good.
3. hi. i sent you an email. ok.
4. hi. i am sorry you feel that way.

the back reads:

hi. hello. it was nice meeting you. i hope we can be friends. let's get together soon. ok.

the cards measure 4.125 x 5.875", are packaged in a glassine bag and ship with cardboard panels for protection. take the time to let someone know how you feel. then wait several days to see their reaction. ok.

name: hi. i am in love with you. ok. poster
description: hello. this is a 26 x 40" poster, one color, commercially silk-screened on white paper stock. tell someone that you love them. tell them every time they look at this poster. it ships rolled in kraft paper in a tube.
